input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.title: Go to Covington City Public Schools

a.div: 606 South Lexington Avenue, Covington, Virginia 24426 | Phone 540-965-1410 | Fax 540-965-5870

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: latoregular, serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span:
Covington High School, named a historical landmark in 2008, serves students in grades 8 – 12. The faculty and staff at CHS offer a wealth of academics and extra-curricular activities for students.
All staff members at CHS have high expectations for each other, students, and parents. These expectations are implemented throughout the school-wide COUGAR PRIDE (

letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: latoregular, serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: latoregular, serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.span: -excellence) program, which raises the standards for academics, behavior, and social maturity.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: latoregular, serif; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

em.span: Students learn best when a variety of learning activities are implemented.

em.span: Each student is a valued individual with unique physical, social, emotional, and intellectual needs.

em.span: Students learn best when they are actively engaged in the learning process.

em.span: Student learning is enhanced by a safe and physically comfortable environment.

em.span: A student’s self-esteem is enhanced by positive relationships.
